messages.message: PSA: In case you didn't know already, the Amazing Spider-Man by David Michelinie/Todd McFarlane Omnibus is coming back to print in October 2018.
Been rereading the Ultimate run and FUCK its great
Does Stark make new webbing for Spiderman in homecoming?
I hope to god that Michael Giacchino turns his version of the Spider-Man theme song that played during the Marvel logo into a full fledged theme song for the next Spider-Man movie
